# Dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
pnpm-debug.log*

# Production builds
dist/
build/
*.min.js
*.min.css

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# IDE and Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
lerna-debug.log*

# Runtime data
pids/
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/
*.lcov

# nyc test coverage
.nyc_output

# Dependency directories
jspm_packages/

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Microbundle cache
.rpt2_cache/
.rts2_cache_cjs/
.rts2_cache_es/
.rts2_cache_umd/

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variables file
.env.test

# parcel-bundler cache (https://parceljs.org/)
.cache
.parcel-cache

# next.js build output
.next

# nuxt.js build output
.nuxt

# vuepress build output
.vuepress/dist

# Serverless directories
.serverless/

# FuseBox cache
.fusebox/

# DynamoDB Local files
.dynamodb/

# TernJS port file
.tern-port

# Temporary folders
tmp/
temp/

# Audio/Video recordings (large files)
recordings/
*.webm
*.mp4
*.wav
*.mp3
*.ogg

# Generated documentation
docs/api/

# Backup files
*.backup
*.bak
*.orig

# Test artifacts
test-results/
screenshots/
videos/

# Lighthouse reports
lighthouse-report.html
lighthouse-report.json

# Webpack bundle analyzer
webpack-stats.json

# Local development
.local/

# Netlify
.netlify/

# Vercel
.vercel/

# GitHub Pages
_site/

# Jekyll
.sass-cache/
.jekyll-cache/
.jekyll-metadata

# Ignore sensitive configuration
config/secrets.js
keys.js
credentials.json

# Ignore large assets that should be hosted elsewhere
assets/large/
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar

# Ignore user-generated content in examples
examples/user-recordings/
examples/temp/

# Ignore development databases
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Ignore generated API documentation
api-docs/

# Ignore performance monitoring files
performance-*.json
memory-*.json

# Ignore browser-specific files
.chrome/
.firefox/
.safari/

# Ignore service worker cache
sw-cache/
workbox-*.js

# Ignore PWA generated files
manifest-*.json
sw-*.js

# Ignore analytics and tracking
analytics.js
tracking.js
gtag.js

# Ignore experimental features
experimental/
prototype/
sandbox/

# Ignore security scan results
security-scan.json
vulnerability-report.html

# Ignore benchmark results
benchmark-*.json
performance-test-*.html
